  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String name, String color, String suit, int rank, ImageIcon image)
      Parameters:
      i - Name of the Card. Ex. King
      j - What color the card is (Black or Red).
      suit - What suit the card is (Diamonds, Hearts, Clubs, Spades).
      string - What rank the card is depending on what the current trump card is.

    • Card

      public Card(int number, int value, String suit, ImageIcon image)
      The card constructor for the Blackjack game.
      Parameters:
      number - The number of the card (1 - 52).
      value - The value of the card (2 - 11).
      suit - The suit of the card (Hearts, Diamonds, Clubs, Spades).
      image - The image of the specified card.
